channel.title: CVE Feed for Castos -- Seriously Simple Stats
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Castos -- Seriously Simple Stats

item.title: CVE-2023-45001|2023-11-06T08:20:44.318Z -- castos -- seriously%20simple%20stats
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Castos Seriously Simple Stats allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Seriously Simple Stats: from n/a through 1.5.0.
